org.xbib.elasticsearch.river.jdbc

Interface RiverFlow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Runnable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColumnRiverFlow, SimpleRiverFlow

    public interface RiverFlow
extends Runnable
    RiverFlow API. The RiverFlow is the abstraction to the thread which performs data fetching from the river source and transports it to the river mouth

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ID_INFO_RIVER_INDEX
      The doc ID of the info document in the river index
